title: Accident in Wanawasala, Train operations delayed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two persons were injured when a car collided with a train in Wanawasala, Kelaniya on Wednesday (18).
Superintendent of Railways Gamini Seneviratne stated that the train services on the main line were disrupted as a result of the accident.
